channel.title: Khalid Saidi on Trying Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Khalid Saidi on Trying Hugo

item.title: Ionic and native plugins
item.description: To be able to use a native plugin Make sure it’s inside: this.platform.ready().then(() => { // Use your plugin here, ex: this.uniqueDeviceID.get() .then((uuid: any) => { console.log(uuid); }); } If you don’t, you might get unexpected behavior. In my case, it was working on androind but not on ios Hope it helps Khalid

item.title: Git, how to clone into an existing directory
item.description: to clone into an existing directory: git clone https://myrepo.com/git.git temp mv temp/.git code/.git rm -rf temp Hope it helps Khalid

item.title: How to find a string in a list of compressed files recursively
item.description: I’ve always needed to find string in a a list of Java ears and wars. I’ve been extracing them and using grep and find I finally found the best tool to achieve the task and it’s called crgrep. It can be downloaded here: https://sourceforge.net/p/crgrep/wiki/Home/ Hope it helps Khalid

item.title: Mac and Seagate External Hard Drive
item.description: I have an external hard drive where I store the pictures and videos I take with my phone. I use a Mac and I wasn’t able to access my external hard drive since it’s NTFS. I found few paid applications that allow mounting NTFS on a Mac. I tried one and it works pretty well, but since I’m not using the external hard drive extensively I was reticent investing in a product that I was only gonna use to transfer medias from my phone.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Hello, this is Khalid. Welcome to my blog I spend most of time experimenting with different technologies in software web development. When I have an issue, like most people, I search on the web, and sometimes I just don’t find what I need exactly. So I keep looking and working until I make my own solution. I thought why not share my findings hoping someone might find them useful

item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
